command.name: create

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.resourcePolicies" options="resource-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.scopes" options="scopes" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="resourcePolicies" arg="$body.properties.resourcePolicies">
<prop type="array" name="scopes" arg="$body.properties.scopes">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the project policy.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$body.properties.resourcePolicies" options="resource-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$body.properties.scopes" options="scopes" group="Properties">

json.schema:

<prop type="array" name="scopes" arg="$body.properties.scopes">
